reviewText: What an excellent way to teach old and young of where the songs originated from and who sung them.  It was wonderful seeing young and old actors in this video. I wish it came in a DVD.  I just love watching it and sharing it with others every Christmas.  5 stars for me.  Thanks also for the speedy delivery.

Really bad recording. My machine is really good, but has trouble trying to track the tape.
This is a really great movie if the tape was better.
Tape was all I expected my other one got taped over so I was glad to be able to replace it.  It arrived in a timely manner. I viewed it and now it is ready for viewing next Christmas.
